Package org.bonitasoft.engine.platform

Interface Platform

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlatformImpl
public interface Platform extends Serializable
Contains information about the Bonita Platform.

The platform is the base on which runs the Bonita Engine. There is only one platform for a running Bonita Engine.

In order to perform actions on the platform, please, refer to the PlatformAPI

Since:
6.0.0
Author:
Matthieu Chaffotte

  • Method Details

    • getVersion

      String getVersion()
      Retrieves the platform version
      Returns:
      a String representing the platform version
      See Also:
      • getPreviousVersion()
      • getInitialVersion()

    • getPreviousVersion

      @Deprecated String getPreviousVersion()
      Deprecated.
      since 7.11.0. There is no replacement for this method because previous version is always deterministic
      This method is deprecated. It used to return the previous version of bonita if the platform was migrated. However this previous version was always exactly the n-1 version compared to the current one.
      Returns:
      an empty string (deprecated)

    • getInitialVersion

      String getInitialVersion()
      Retrieves the platform initial version. That is, the Bonita version in which you have initially created the platform before migrating to the current version.

      For instance, if you have created your platform in the version 6.1.0 and have migrated to the version 6.3.4 using the Bonita Migration Tool, getInitialVersion will return 6.1.0, getPreviousVersion() will return 6.3.3 and getVersion() will return 6.3.4.

      Returns:
      a String representing the platform initial version
      See Also:
      • getVersion()
      • getPreviousVersion()

    • getCreated

      long getCreated()
      Retrieves the timestamp at which the platform was created
      Returns:
      a long representing the timestamp at which the platform was created

    • getCreatedBy

      String getCreatedBy()
      Retrieves the name of the platform technical user that created the platform
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the platform technical user that created the platform
